title: Memoirs of the American Academy in Rome

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

additional-notes: This is an Italian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. However, the American Academy does have a US presence, and US publishers, sponsors, and places of publication are explicitly mentioned in the front matter of some volumes.
Spot checks of volumes from 1980 and before did not turn up copyright notices.
